import React from "react"; import Header from "./Header"; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}
{/* Main Content Section */}
{/* Section 1: Text Left, Image Right */}

A Greener Tomorrow

Join us in creating a sustainable future by protecting our planet. Our mission is to raise awareness and provide solutions for a cleaner, greener, and healthier world. Together, we can make a difference!

{/* Section 2: Image Left, Text Right */}

Protecting Wildlife

Wildlife conservation is essential to preserve biodiversity and maintain ecological balance. Let us take steps to protect animals and their natural habitats for future generations.

{/* Section 3: Text Left, Image Right */}

Sustainable Living

Embrace sustainable practices in your daily life. From reducing waste to using renewable energy, every small action contributes to a healthier planet. Together, we can achieve a sustainable lifestyle!

{/* Footer Section */}

© 2024 Green Future. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Home;
